title: Another New Option For Custom Game
body: I have a good idea Riot can put on custom games, they should make all champions playable in custom games, this would be good for players who want to try out new champs before buying them, it would be easier to make decisions on who to buy with this option, instead of waiting months and months for a 6300 champ, players can easily play this mode and decide if they would buy them, and I think Riot can make faster profit this way. Share your thoughts below and I hope Riot would consider doing this.

replies.body: This will never happen. There is a reason why we have weekly champion rotations.
